name: Zether
description:
Zether is a VR demonstration game. It can be entierly played with head movements and therefore is accessible to anyone, including people with motor disabilities. A calibration menu allows each player to adjust the sensibility to match his capacities. The game features seven levels plus a free flight one. Try to complete each one as fast as possible to reach the highest score.

VR games are unadvised to people suffering from photosensitive epilepsy.
